summary: An email from a federal prosecutor to Dr. Hughes regarding the United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell case, inquiring about Dr. Hughes's availability to testify as an expert witness at the trial scheduled for July 12, 2021.

persons.name: Dr. Hughes
persons.context: Addressed in an email from a federal prosecutor who is inquiring about his/her availability to testify as an expert witness in the Ghislaine Maxwell trial.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The defendant in the case 'United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell' which is the subject of the email and scheduled for trial.

connections.description: Dr. Hughes is being contacted to potentially provide expert testimony in the criminal trial against Ghislaine Maxwell.

events.title: Scheduled Trial of Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: The trial for the case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell is scheduled to begin.

events.title: Prosecutor Contact Regarding Expert Testimony
events.description: A federal prosecutor emails Dr. Hughes to discuss potential expert testimony for the upcoming Maxwell trial.

keyFacts: The email is from a federal prosecutor handling the United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell case.
The prosecutor is seeking Dr. Hughes as a potential expert witness for the trial.
The trial was scheduled to begin on July 12, 2021, in the Southern District of New York.
